topic.title: Update Forum Icon
topic.body:
The forum icon is hosted on iconfinder.com and will expose your IP adress to this service unless you use Tor browser or block any traffic outside of localhost when browsing ZeroNet.

This also caused this Forum to be added to the Privacy blocklist (http://127.0.0.1:43110/18zoKfKYPnVBuHtKpK1mhAuVsWXV72obA1/). 

You might want to update the Icon to be contained locally in the Zite.
